content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings Farhad, thank you for your interest in our apartment in Magdeburg. To begin our discussion, I hope you understand that rental prices may vary depending on individual negotiations. However, as a landlord seeking the highest possible return on investment, my initial thought is to propose a price of 1200 Euros per month. If this number works for you or if you have a different offer in mind, please feel free to share it.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate the information given about the apartment in Magdeburg, but I don't want to continue the negotiation at this moment because I need time to evaluate my budget and other alternatives. Once I have a clear understanding of my financial situation, I will reach out to discuss a suitable rental price. Thank you for your understanding.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your need for further consideration, Farhad. Taking time to assess your budget and other options is perfectly reasonable. Please do not hesitate to contact me when you feel ready to continue our discussion, and I will be more than happy to work towards finding a mutually agreeable rental price. Until then, have a great day. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
